scriptedEmail.name: User Reset Password
scriptedEmail.description: Sends an email when a user requests a password reset
scriptedEmail.languageResources: <language key="en-us"> <resource name="Body_Disclaimer">If you did not request this email, please ignore it.</resource> <resource name="Body_ForgottenPassword">You just let us know that you have forgotten your password or login name for {site_name}.</resource> <resource name="Body_LoginName">Your login name is: {username}</resource> <resource name="Body_ResetPassword">If you forgot your password and need to reset it: {reset_password_link}.</resource> <resource name="ResetPassword">reset your password</resource> <resource name="Subject">{site_name}: Reset Password</resource> <resource name="Header">Reset Password</resource> </language>
